value.name: ground friction scale
value.tooltip: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

value.name: ground friction normal k1 scale
value.tooltip: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

value.name: ground friction normal k0 scale
value.tooltip: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

value.name: ground depth scale
value.tooltip: depth a point mass rests in the ground

value.name: ground damp fraction scale
value.tooltip: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick
